title: Inherit class from React not work with jest
body:
Dear all:

when I use jest with inherit class from React . it cause an error. It looks a React issue not jest,so I post here.

the demo based on  [jest react-es6 example](https://github.com/facebook/jest/tree/master/examples/react-es6) 

I just change two line and add a custom file, I paste them at [gist](https://gist.github.com/9nix00/c4f4ef67f4f3acd0cd44)

errors:

```
Using Jest CLI v0.4.15
 FAIL  __tests__/CheckboxWithLabel-test.js (1.303s)
● CheckboxWithLabel › it changes the text after click
  - TypeError: Cannot read property 'textContent' of undefined
        at Spec.<anonymous> (/Users/breezekay/Codes/github/jest/examples/react-es6/__tests__/CheckboxWithLabel-test.js:19:24)
        at jasmine.Block.execute (/Users/breezekay/Codes/github/jest/vendor/jasmine/jasmine-1.3.0.js:1065:17)
        at jasmine.Queue.next_ (/Users/breezekay/Codes/github/jest/vendor/jasmine/jasmine-1.3.0.js:2098:31)
        at null._onTimeout (/Users/breezekay/Codes/github/jest/vendor/jasmine/jasmine-1.3.0.js:2088:18)
        at Timer.listOnTimeout [as ontimeout] (timers.js:121:15)
1 test failed, 0 tests passed (1 total)
Run time: 1.546s
npm ERR! Test failed.  See above for more details.
npm ERR! not ok code 0

```

Node version:v0.10.40
React version:v0.13.3
Jest version:v0.4.15

the problem looks cause by TestUtils,It always return undefined when use custom/react.

```
TestUtils.renderIntoDocument(
      <CheckboxWithLabel labelOn="On" labelOff="Off" />
);
```

OR

maybe I use a wrong way to extend React? 
but it can works except for adding TestCase.
